title: IOT-Enabled Adaptive Street Lighting Based on Traffic and Weather Patterns
description: A decentralized adaptive street lighting system that combines edge computing, context-aware transformer models, and multimodal sensor fusion to eliminate centralized bottlenecks.

title: Bomb Detection Rover

title: Smart Spectacle System
